20101222073949.000|20101222073950.000|CC1|>> AT THAT POINT, THAT'S SORT OF

20101222080550.000|20101222080552.000|CC1|>> WELL, THE NOVEL IS TOLD IN

20101222080558.000|20101222080559.000|CC1|FUNNY.

20101222080600.000|20101222080602.000|CC1|IT'S... I MEAN, IT GRABS YOU    
20101222080602.000|20101222080606.000|CC1|RIGHT AWAY AND IT'S A REALLY    
20101222080606.000|20101222080611.000|CC1|GOOD YARN AND IT'S SORT OF LIKE 
20101222080611.000|20101222080612.000|CC1|A... I WAS READING IT TO MY KID.
20101222080612.000|20101222080614.000|CC1|IN MANY WAYS IT'S LIKE A YOUNG  
20101222080614.000|20101222080618.000|CC1|ADULT ADVENTURE STORY BUT TOLD  
20101222080618.000|20101222080620.000|CC1|IN A WAY THAT'S REALLY CLOSER TO
20101222080620.000|20101222080622.000|CC1|LITERATURE THAN IT IS TO SORT OF
20101222080622.000|20101222080623.000|CC1|A GENRE NOVEL.                  
20101222080623.000|20101222080625.000|CC1|>> Rose: SOMEONE SPECULATED

20101222080626.000|20101222080628.000|CC1|IS GOING TO BE ON THE CHRISTMAS

20101222081333.000|20101222081335.000|CC1|WE CAST A GIRL FROM... IN OUR   
20101222081335.000|20101222081336.000|CC1|BACKYARD FROM LOS ANGELES.      
20101222081336.000|20101222081337.000|CC1|>> Rose: DID YOU HAVE TO        
20101222081337.000|20101222081339.000|CC1|CONVINCE JEFF THAT SHE HAS THE  
20101222081339.000|20101222081340.000|CC1|ACTING CHOPS?

20101222081342.000|20101222081342.000|CC1|JEFF.

20101222082102.000|20101222082103.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE?                     
20101222082103.000|20101222082105.000|CC1|>> YEAH, I THINK THE PHONE CALLS
20101222082105.000|20101222082106.000|CC1|WITH JOEL AND ETHAN ARE
